title: CEP Campaign Finance Party Vocabulary
description: Controlled vocabulary for political parties and party-like designations used in campaign finance reporting.

terms.label: Democratic Party
terms.definition: A political party commonly abbreviated as DEM in campaign finance reporting.

terms.label: Republican Party
terms.definition: A political party commonly abbreviated as REP or GOP in campaign finance reporting.

terms.label: Green Party
terms.definition: A political party associated with environmental and ecological politics.

terms.label: Libertarian Party
terms.definition: A political party generally emphasizing individual liberty, limited government, and free markets.

terms.label: Independent or Non-affiliated
terms.definition: A candidate or committee not formally affiliated with a recognized political party.

terms.label: Nonpartisan or No Party Preference
terms.definition: A designation for candidates or races where party affiliation is not formally recognized or disclosed.

terms.label: Other Party
terms.definition: A party designation not captured by any more specific term in this vocabulary.

terms.label: Unknown or Unspecified
terms.definition: Party information is missing, unknown, or not provided in the source data.
